name: HistoplasmosisTestsForHistoplasmaCapsulatumAntigen
title: Histoplasmosis (Tests for Histoplasma capsulatum Antigen)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test panel names associated with detecting the presence of Histoplasmosis Antigen),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Histoplasmosis Ag),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
